home.welcome_description: Welcome to the official documentation for the Lopple bot. Here you will find detailed information about how it works and the available commands.

overview.title: Quick Overview
overview.description: Lopple is a Discord bot developed in Python, designed to be the core of a Splatoon 3 tournament called Stellaris Phantasm.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1:
Lopple is part of a community-organized Splatoon 3 tournament.
The tournament is called Stellaris Phantasm.
faq.a2: Any Splatoon 3 player with a Discord account can sign up.
faq.a3: You can register via the Sendou.ink website.

privacidad.p1: Lopple does not collect or store personal data from users. Our website is designed solely to provide technical information about the bot and the project.
privacidad.p2: No forms or subscription systems that collect data are used.
privacidad.p3: If functionalities involving data collection are implemented in the future, this policy will be duly updated.

cookies.p1: This website does not use cookies, so no data related to user navigation on Lopple is stored on the device.
cookies.p2: If cookies are implemented, prior consent will be requested according to current regulations.
